name: BeachWatch
description:
David, the beach's life-guard, is sick of all of the pollution happening right under his nose. He decides to take measures to punish these polluters and clean his beach. They will learn a wet lesson! As a bonus, David might fish some beauties... After all, the coolest guy is not the one who plays football, but the one who cares after the environment!

This game was made for Games for Good 2017 as a challenge for Brigada do Mar,  by:

  • Gonçalo Tavares (music)
  • Sara Martins (programming, art)
  • Tiago Coelho (art)
  • Vasco Rodrigues (programming)

On Mobile, Swipe Left and Right to move, and Tap to shoot.

Be careful to just punish the polluters, and to not miss any trash left on the beach ;)
